title: Assignment: Build Your Portfolio Component
description: Create a personal portfolio component using everything you've learned

content.title: Portfolio Component Challenge
content.instructions: Create a portfolio component that showcases your skills and projects. This assignment will test your understanding of components, props, and JSX.

requirements.text: Accept props for name, title, skills array, and projects array
Display the name and title in appropriate heading tags
Render skills as an unordered list
Display projects with title and description for each
Use proper JSX syntax and component structure
Add basic styling with className attributes

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A responsive weather application using React and API integration

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A productivity app with CRUD operations and local storage

rubric.excellent: 90-100 points: All requirements met with clean, efficient code and good practices
rubric.good: 80-89 points: Most requirements met with minor issues or missing optional features
rubric.satisfactory: 70-79 points: Basic requirements met but needs improvement in code quality or completeness
rubric.needsWork: Below 70 points: Missing key requirements or significant code issues
